title: Spirits of the Season
description:
Now, Halloween is a powerful night made even more powerful this year by light of a blue moon. Special care should be taken on this night unless you want to release the spirits of the season that beckon from the darkness. First, preparations for a Halloween party go horribly wrong. And then, a necromancer is born against his will. Followed by a house too haunted to call home. And finally, a soul laid to rest far too soon.


When your teamwork is effective - nothing can stop you. To start your free 14-day trial, go to monday.com


You can try Caliper CBD risk-free for 30 days. trycaliper.com/scary


Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
